PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12042017-09-29PS,  IRCC,  CBSA,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to create a baseline of consistent and transparent conditions to be imposed on non-citizens who are not detained and are subject to an inadmissibility report or certificate on security grounds which has been referred to the Immigration division or the Federal Court respectively, or who have already been found inadmissible on grounds of security.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0214 Publication Date: 2017-10-18
AttachmentsAttachment
